name: Crosswords Word Mania PRO
description:
Crosswords PRO Word Mania is a new addicting highscores word search game in which you must find all the words on screen as fast as possible! The game contains thousands of words, infinite number of levels so you will never play the same game twice! Great casual fun for all ages!

You can play word search puzzles in 9 languages - English, Spanish, German, French, Brazil, Portuguese, Czech, Italian and Russian! More languages coming soon!

You can even create your own crosswords in our Editor! Just enter your words
and play it with your friends!

What more? You collect points for each completed game, so more games you play, the better overall score you get! At the end of each game you can submit your overall score to a global leaderboard and see scores of other people!

How to play: Find all the words above the board as fast as possible! Your score depends on your speed! More games you play, more score you get! Submit your overall score at the end of each game! You can display scores of other people in the main menu by pressing your overall score in the top right corner.

How to select a word: Put your finger on a letter and move it horizontally, vertically or diagonally to select a word! You can use each letter on the board multiple times!

Features:
* Addicting word search game
* Thousands of words included
* Supports 9 languages - English, Spanish, German, French, Brazil, Portuguese, Czech, Italian and Russian! More languages coming soon!
* Infinite number of crosswords + each game is different
* More games you play, the better score you get
* Great game to learn new English words
* Improve your English Vocabulary
* Crossword editor included - create your own crosswords games
* Global leaderboard included - compare your score with other people all around the world!
* Great casual game for the whole family

Have a nice time playing our game Crosswords PRO and if you like the game and want to support it, please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support.

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!
